thread.title: Great place to stay for this part of London
thread.title_full: Great place to stay for this part of London - Review of Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: b21r
title: Great place to stay for this part of London
text:
I have stayed here a few times and always find it buzzing with guests. Never had to wait at check-in and the reception has always been friendly. Plus points - clean & comfy beds, quiet accommodation, clean bathrooms with good water pressure and fluffy towels. Breakfast is usual Premier Inn and the staff are friendly.
Great connections by rail and I love Westfield shopping centre right on the doorstep.
Only "downsides" are that it's not cheap and not all of floors have a great view.
Room Tip: Ask for a room with a view, some have a stunning view of London. See more room tips
